languages.text: "Здравый смысл — не то, чем оперируют аколиты Святого Ордоса, фон Валанциус. Мы находим средство и используем его, чтобы прийти к цели. Именно это я и сделала".
"Reason is not what guides the acolytes of the Holy Ordos, von Valancius. We find a tool and we use it to achieve a particular end. And that is exactly what I have done."
languages.original_text: "Здравый смысл — не то, чем оперируют аколиты Святого Ордоса, фон Валанциус. Мы находим средство и используем его, чтобы прийти к цели. Именно это я и сделала".

traits.locale_text: "Reason is not what guides the acolytes of the Holy Ordos, von Valancius. We find a tool and we use it to achieve a particular end. And that is exactly what I have done."
"Reason is not what guides the acolytes of the Holy Ordos, von Valancius. We find a tool and we use it to achieve a particular end. And that is exactly what I have done."
"Reason is not what guides the acolytes of the Holy Ordos, von Valancius. We find a tool and we use it to achieve a particular end. And that is exactly what I have done."
"Reason is not what guides the acolytes of the Holy Ordos, von Valancius. We find a tool and we use it to achieve a particular end. And that is exactly what I have done."

languages.text: “对审判庭的侍仆而言，情理并不是行事的指导原则，冯·瓦兰修斯。我们会寻找工具，利用工具实现预期的目的。而这，正是我所做的事情。”
languages.original_text: "Reason is not what guides the acolytes of the Holy Ordos, von Valancius. We find a tool and we use it to achieve a particular end. And that is exactly what I have done."

traits.locale_text: “对审判庭的侍仆而言，情理并不是行事的指导原则，冯·瓦兰修斯。我们会寻找工具，利用工具实现预期的目的。而这，正是我所做的事情。”

languages.text: «El raciocinio no es lo que guía a los acólitos de los Santos Ordos, von Valancius. Encontramos una herramienta y la utilizamos para cumplir un propósito concreto. Eso es exactamente lo que he hecho».
languages.original_text: "Reason is not what guides the acolytes of the Holy Ordos, von Valancius. We find a tool and we use it to achieve a particular end. And that is exactly what I have done."

traits.locale_text: «El raciocinio no es lo que guía a los acólitos de los Santos Ordos, von Valancius. Encontramos una herramienta y la utilizamos para cumplir un propósito concreto. Eso es exactamente lo que he hecho».

languages.text: 「聖なる宗団のアコライトを導くのが理由ではありません、フォン・ヴァランシウス。私たちは手段を見つけ、それを使って特定の目的を達成します。そして、それこそがまさに私がやったことなのです」
languages.original_text: "Reason is not what guides the acolytes of the Holy Ordos, von Valancius. We find a tool and we use it to achieve a particular end. And that is exactly what I have done."

traits.locale_text: 「聖なる宗団のアコライトを導くのが理由ではありません、フォン・ヴァランシウス。私たちは手段を見つけ、それを使って特定の目的を達成します。そして、それこそがまさに私がやったことなのです」

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas la raison qui guide les acolytes du Saint Ordo, von Valancius. Lorsque nous trouvons un outil, nous l'employons pour accomplir un objectif spécifique, et c'est précisément ce que j'ai fait. »
languages.original_text: "Reason is not what guides the acolytes of the Holy Ordos, von Valancius. We find a tool and we use it to achieve a particular end. And that is exactly what I have done."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas la raison qui guide les acolytes de la Sainte Inquisition, von Valancius. Lorsque nous trouvons un outil, nous l'employons pour accomplir un objectif spécifique, et c'est précisément ce que j'ai fait. »

languages.text: "Vernunft ist nicht die Antriebsfeder der Akolythen der Heiligen Ordos, von Valancius. Wir finden ein Werkzeug und benutzen es, um ein bestimmtes Ziel zu erreichen. Und genau das habe ich getan."
languages.original_text: "Reason is not what guides the acolytes of the Holy Ordos, von Valancius. We find a tool and we use it to achieve a particular end. And that is exactly what I have done."

traits.locale_text: "Vernunft ist nicht die Antriebsfeder der Akolythen der Heiligen Ordos, von Valancius. Wir finden ein Werkzeug und benutzen es, um ein bestimmtes Ziel zu erreichen. Und genau das habe ich getan."

languages.text: "Kutsal Nizam havarilerine kılavuzluk eden mantık değildir von Valancius. Bir gereç bulur ve onu kullanarak amaçladığımız sonuca ulaşırız. Yaptığım tam olarak buydu."
languages.original_text: "Reason is not what guides the acolytes of the Holy Ordos, von Valancius. We find a tool and we use it to achieve a particular end. And that is exactly what I have done."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal Nizam havarilerine kılavuzluk eden şey mantıktır von Valancius. Bir gereç buluruz ve amaçladığımız sonuca ulaşmak için onu kullanırız. Yaptığım şey de tam olarak buydu."
